meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jessica Young Chrisanne Eastwood Mike Wallace Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6505.

td.p: Jessica Young, a recent college graduate originally from Charleston, West Virginia
Chrisanne Eastwood, a bookseller from Moorpark, California
Mike Wallace, a real estate agent from Sunnyside, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $28,800)

tr.td: DOUBLE TALK
SKYSCRAPER CITY
SHEEP-POURRI
COLLEGE BASKETBALL
MARCH MADNESS

Mike
')

')

tr.td: Mike
Chrisanne
Jessica

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Mike
Chrisanne
Jessica
THE WAR ON CHRISTMAS
SIGNATURE SONGS
(Alex: We'll give you the [*], you name the singer or the group.)
CHEWING GUAM
"D" IN SCIENCE
AMERICAN POETRY
WORDS WITHIN WORDS
(Alex: Each response appears within the text of the clue.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: This is not as easy as some people may think. I came up with one of the three, then I kind of stalled.)
...
(Alex: [To Chrisanne] You\'re absolutely right--Ethiopian capital.)
ChrisanneWhat is Addis Ababa?
$0
JessicaWhat is ... ___
$1,453
MikeWhat is Addis Ababa?
$3,000
(1 of) Addis Ababa, San Salvador, or Phnom Penh')
